air-mode.description:
Air mode is an experimental practice mode that you can practice without a device.
The characters or chords will be automatically entered at the speed you set, so you can follow along and move your fingers as if you were typing or chording.
air-mode.character-entry-speed-input-aria-label: input box for character entry speed in air mode
air-mode.chord-speed-input-aria-label: input box for chord speed in air mode

import-device-layout-file-step: (Optional) Import a device layout file (the backup file from
device-layout.file-input-aria-label: file input for selecting a device layout file to load into this tool

chord-practice-setting.title: chord - practice setting
import-chord-list-file-step: Import your chord list file (the backup file from
website). (for first time usage or updating the chord list)
chord-practice-setting.file-input-aria-label: file input for selecting a chord list file to load into this tool
chord-practice-setting.select-chords-step: Select the chords you want to practice from the imported chord list below.
chord-practice-setting.click-start-button-step: Click the following button to start the practice.

delete-chords-confirm-dialog.description: Are you sure to delete all the imported chords?

delete-device-layouts-confirm-dialog.description:
Are you sure to delete all the imported device layouts?
(After deleted, the selected device layout will be changed to CC1/CC2 default.)

key-notation-help-dialog.title: key notation
key-notation-help-dialog.key-notation-explanation-paragraph: In this tool, key notation is an experimental short format that represents the key locations on CharaChorder 3D input devices.
key-notation-help-dialog.key-notation-example-paragraph: For example, the 'Left Thumb Middle West' key is noted as 'L1bW', and the 'Right Pinky Down (3D press)' is noted as 'R5D'.
key-notation-help-dialog.first-and-last-letters-explanation-parag: The first and the last letters are the shorthands for the side (L/R) and the direction (N/E/S/W/D), respectively.
middle-part-explanation-paragraph: The middle part indicates the switch. The number represents the finger (1 to 5: thumb to pinky), using the same way as
fingering notation for keyboard instruments in modern scores.
The additional 'b' and 'bb', originating from the
in music, are used to indicate the secondary/middle and back switch of that finger.
key-notation-help-dialog.layout-image-explanation-paragraph: Below is a layout image that shows the notation of each switch.

key-combination-sides-choice: Tend to choose the key combination from
character-key-side-choice: Tend to choose the character key on the

layout-song-help-dialog.title: layout song
layout-song-help-dialog.summary: Layout song is a AI-generated song that can help you memorize the letter keys on the default layout.
layout-song-help-dialog.tool-explanation: The lyrics was generated by Kimi K2 Thinking, and the whole song by Suno AI.
layout-song-help-dialog.license-explanation: This song is licensed for non-commercial use only.
download-explanation: of this song if you need them. Please don't use this song for any commercial purpose!

thumb-rotation-angle.title: rotation angle for thumb switches
thumb-rotation-angle.input-aria-label: input box for rotation angle for thumb switches on the layout display

non-thumb-rotation-angle.title: rotation angle for non-thumb switches
non-thumb-rotation-angle.input-aria-label: input box for rotation angle for non-thumb switches on the layout display

thumb-3-switch-help-dialog.title: thumb 3 switch
thumb-3-switch-help-dialog.content: Master Forge doesn't have the thumb 3 switches as CharaChorder One and CharaChorder Two. If you use Master Forge, or you use CharaChorder One or CharaChorder Two but don't use the thumb 3 switches, you can uncheck this setting to hide them in the layout.

visibility-setting.thumb-3-switch-help-button-aria-label: open help dialog for thumb 3 switch
visibility-setting.key-notation-help-button-aria-label: open help dialog for key notation

summary: An unofficial practice tool tailored for
lesson-start-instruction: key to enter the first lesson, or select a lesson from the list on the left.

cc1-cc2-default: Device Layout is set to "CC1/CC2 default".
m4g-default: Device Layout is set to "M4G default".

information-page.description: This website, Alnitak, is an unofficial practice tool designed for CharaChorder 3D input devices, including CharaChorder One, CharaChorder Two and Master Forge.

key-lesson-page.title: key lesson page
description: At key lesson page, you can practice typing the number, letter, or symbol keys on your CharaChorder 3D input device. The accessible lessons are listed in the side menu.
If you want a goal for your practice, you can try to achieve both 100 combos and 100 CPM at the same time under each non-review lesson. (I wrote

description.text: my suggestions for learning English character entry on CharaChorder 3D input devices in this article

statistics-page.title: statistics page
statistics-page.description: At statistics page, you can check the statistics of your practices in key lessons, including a graph that shows your typing speed and combo counts over time.

chord-page.title: chord page
chord-page.description: At chord page, you can pick several chords in your chord library and practice them.

layout-viewer-page.title: layout viewer page
layout-viewer-page.description: At layout viewer page, you can see the actual output layout of your device under a certain OS keyboard layout and modifier keys (Shift and Alt Graph) state. It also provides key searching and layout printing features.

layout-song-page.title: layout song page
layout-song-page.description: At layout song page, there is an AI-generated song that can help you memorize the letter keys on the default layout.

settings-page.title: settings page
settings-page.description: At settings page, you can tweak some settings of this tool, such as the visibility of some components, the highlight logic on the layout preview, the device layout, the air mode, etc.

disclaimers.title: disclaimers
description: This site is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with CharaChorder and Forge Keyboard. Their official websites can be found at
Your typing statistics and settings in this tool are kept and stored locally in the
of your browser. They are not transmitted to any other place via this tool.

layout-song-page.title: layout song
layout-song-page.help-button-aria-label: open help dialog for layout song
